author: hwright
msg: Add '--xml' support for 'svn propget' on versioned properties.
(print_properties_xml):  New.  Print a filename:properties hash to xml.
(print_properties):  New.  Print a filename:properties hash to stdout.

author: hwright
msg: Use the SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT format string where appropriate.
[Note: This commit was reverted in r23323.]
Use SVN_REVNUM_T_FMT instead of "ld" when converting revisions to strings.

author: hwright
msg: Add support for '--xml' to 'svn propget' for revision properties.
(svn_cl__propget): Output xml revision properties when requested.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Add --xml to the list of options supported by propget.
